refsect1.title: DESCRIPTION
refsect1.para: The kea-sockcreator daemon's entire job is to create sockets and assign names to them.
The kea-sockcreator daemon will exit if there is an unrecoverable error or unknown command.

refsect1.title: HISTORY
refsect1.para: The b10-sockcreator daemon was initially designed by Michal Vaner of CZNIC.
Kea became a standalone server and the BIND10 framework was removed. The socket creator server binary was renamed to kea-sockcreator in July 2014.
